entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
